class.name: DojoPolicies
class.brief_description: A collection of policies for a Dojo contract.
class.description: This class holds a set of [DojoPolicy] objects for a specific contract. It includes the contract name and a list of associated policies.

method.name: add_policy
method.description: Adds a policy to the collection. The policy can be a [DojoPolicy] object or a dictionary that can be converted to one.

method.name: from_dictionary
method.description: Creates a [DojoPolicies] instance from a dictionary.

method.name: to_dictionary
method.description: Converts the [DojoPolicies] instance to a dictionary.

members.member: The name of the Dojo contract.
The name of the policy set.
